schema.name: Healthyfied Filipino Style Steak

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the eggplant, tomatoes, onion, and cabbage. Cut the red bell pepper into strips.
Season the ribeye steak with salt and pepper on both sides.
Prepare a grill or skillet over medium-high heat. Cook the steak to your preferred doneness, about 4 minutes per side for medium-rare. Let it rest for 3 minutes, then slice against the grain.
Using the same skillet, reduce to medium heat. Add the sliced vegetables and sauté until they are soft and tender, about 5-7 minutes.
Serve the sliced steak topped with the sautéed vegetables.

schema.description: Dive into a guilt-free culinary adventure with our Healthyfied Filipino Style Steak! Tailored for health enthusiasts, this high-protein, low-carb, yet slightly high-sodium recipe brings a healthy twist to your meals without compromising flavor. Perfect for those on a journey for healthier alternatives.
